price: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun bã ka bakwai waɗan da ake maimaita karatunsu* da Alƙur'ãni mai girma.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ سَبۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِي وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِيمَ
footnotes: * Bakwai waɗanda ake maimaita karatunsu su ne Fãtiha mai ãyõyi bakwai. Anã karanta su a cikin kõwace raka'a ta salla.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynāka sabʿan mina al-mathānī wal-qur'āna al-ʿaẓīma
